posts.post_title: FS: T206 Shag Old Mill PSA 5
posts.post_content:
Trying to sell this to pick up a few more T3's. Price is $625 shipped priority and insured. Check or paypal gift, please add 3% if using regular paypal. The last 3 that sold in this grade went for $750 and higher. Please PM or email me if interested.

Thanks,

Andrew
Love the rich color on it and of course his hair is great.
